name: mike42/escpos-php
description: PHP receipt printer library for use with ESC/POS-compatible thermal and impact printers

suggest.guzzlehttp/guzzle: Allows the use of the ApiConnector to send print jobs over HTTP.
suggest.ext-imagick: Will be used for image printing if present. Required for PDF printing or use of custom fonts.
